question: What is the best diet pill on the market??
question_content: Im 205 lbs and Im only 18. I really dont look like it though, I look 160. I just need to lose some extra weight I got from having 2 kids..What is a good, strong diet pill that will give me energy, supress my appetite and help me lose the weight? Thank you..

answers.answer_content: go to your doctor and if you REALLY need it they will prescribe a special medication.

Three steps that have really helped me are dieting, exercising, and the correct weight loss supplement for losing weight. Focus on those three things and you will lose weight considerably. I exercise 30 mins a day along with taking Proactol, a natural weight loss supplement that I saved money on at theweightlossplace.com 

Good luck and stay focused = )

before you decide to consume any diet pills or supplements, it is advisable that you consult your doctor first. Different diet pills work in different ways for different weight problems. However the fact remains that diet pills are created for overweight people to help solve a health problem that can lead to illnesses such as diabetes, depression, heart disease and others.

Read abt the right way to use diet pills
http://rapidweightloss.nmaskuri.com/2007/09/11/the-right-way-to-use-diet-pills/

whether you use pills or not,let me warn you that you still have to change your lifestyle for good- workout often and eat healthy,or else the weight will return at all costs,..just stick to natural stuffs like apple cider vinegar and green tea...chemicals are hazardous...

why cant fat people just exercise REGULARY for once! everyones always looking for a way out by buying something and end up wasting their money over laziness. just stop feeding your face so much and exercise on a regular basis! trust me you will get better faster results and they will be real results
